item.description:
Learn the Most Loving and Heart-Inspired Tools and Techniques from World-Renowned Love, Intimacy and Sexuality Experts!

Our collective intention is to support you

in creating the relationship of your dreams!

And best of all, it's FREE!

 

Join me, Robyn Vogel, MA, LMHC, Tantra and Intimacy Coach
and Founder of Sacred Tantric Fire, as I host this 10-day virtual Fire Circle
where wisdom is shared from a deeply embodied and loving place.

 

Daily from October 15 - October 26, 2012


I have gathered these 8 beautiful, dynamic and wise experts together for this telesummit 
because each of them is personally committed to giving you exactly what you need:

Dawn Cartwright, Tantric Visionary and Founder of the Chandra Bindu Tantra Institute

Rich Walkden, Leader at Human Awareness Institute (HAI) and Clinical Hypnotherapist

Ginger Burr,  Personal stylist and Founder of Total Image Consultants

Ande Lyons, Founder and Chief Passion Curator for BringBackDesire.com

Nina Manolson, Founder of Smokin' Hot Mom and Healthy Yummy Kids

Prana (Regina Barrett), Phoenix Rising Yoga Therapist and Founder of Tantra to Love™

Leah Alchin, Advanced Certified Tantra Educator and world renowned facilitator of More Love Seminars

Michael Mirdad, International Spiritual Leader, Author and Healer

Robyn Vogel, Tantra and Intimacy Coach and Founder of Sacred Tantric Fire

 

SIGN UP FREE HERE!

 

And for more details on the Ignite Your Heart, Transform Your Relationship,

CLICK HERE!
item.name: Ignite Your Heart, Transform Your Relationship(s) -- A Free Teleseminar For You
